Title: Chalo Let's Go
Writer: Anjan Dutt (dialogue), Anjan Dutt (screenplay), Anjan Dutt (story)
Actors: Saswata Chatterjee, Parambrata Chatterjee, Rudranil Ghosh, Ritwick Chakraborty
Plot: This is a story about four friends, Hari, Shekhar, Ashim, and Sanjay. They studied at the same school. Ashim studied to be a doctor, but decided to never pursue that profession. Sanjay ...
